headline: Pomerantz Law Firm Investigates Claims On Behalf of Investors of The Estée Lauder Companies Inc. - EL

headline: Estee Lauder: Pound-The-Table Buy On China Recovery And Margin Expansion
summary: Estee Lauder's stock has plummeted 80%, but I believe the downturn is cyclical, not structural, presenting a pound-the-table buying opportunity. Read more here.

headline: Bath & Body Works forecasts smaller drop in annual sales on strong holiday demand
summary: Bath & Body Works on Monday raised its forecast for full-year adjusted profit and said it expects a smaller drop in annual sales, helped by steadfast demand for its personal care products and new...
